oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pat Gallagher's 8th Annual Christmas Show
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rose, Kristi; Lonesome Bob, 1955-; Womack, Tommy, 1962-; Carroll, Tim (Musician); Split fountain printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (split fountain, red to black, on brown) announcing Pat Gallagher's 8th Christmas Show with Kristi Rose, Lonesome Bob, Tommy Womack, Tim Carroll, Gwil Owen, Paul Zografi, and the Peruvians at Douglas Corner Cafe on December 14. Proceeds from the concert benefiting the Walk for the Homeless Fund.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Casey Gill;
